Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020447 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to allow a use group 2 use on the 2nd through 19th floor at 130 West 30th Street.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020447 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 3 to allow a use group 2 use on the 2nd through 19th floor at 130 West 30th Street.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
